games.title: MR RACER - Car Racing
games.description:
MR Racer puts you in the driver's seat of blazing-fast supercars as you race through chaotic streets, dodge traffic, and conquer fierce racing challenges. With over 100 thrilling missions, limitless chase levels, and a full-fledged career mode, it‚Äôs time to test your reflexes and racing instincts.

Customize and upgrade your rides to stay ahead of the curve. Choose from eye-catching paint jobs, cool wheels, and performance boosts to dominate every track.
games.howToPlayText:
Get ready to hit the streets with MR Racer, where thrilling action unfolds with stylish cars. Race at high speed with stunning supercars and beat the traffic. 
This game provides a very easy-to-control car movement and is extremely fun to race.

Features:

100 levels in Challenge Mode. Let‚Äôs see how many you can complete!
Unlimited levels in Chase Mode. Best of race, chase your opponents and show them that you are a Master!
Career Race Mode: Beat your rivals and be the legend!
15 Supercars available
Upgrade cars to gear up the performance!
Customize cars with attractive car paint and cool wheels
Stunning 3D graphics & realistic lighting
Different Camera angles: First-person view, third-person view, and top-down view
5 realistic locations: Farmland, City, Mountain Day, Mountain Night, and Snow
6 game modes: Challenge mode, Career mode, Chase mode, Endless, Time Trial, and Free ride
Automatic or Manual acceleration option
Engaging and intelligent traffic system
Encouragement from Maria!



Controls:
W / up arrow key = accelerate
A / left arrow key = steer left
D / right arrow key = steer right
S / down arrow key = brake
H = horn

games.title: Moto X3M
games.description:
Moto X3M is an awesome bike game with challenging levels. Choose a bike, put your helmet on, pass obstacles, and get ready to beat the time on tons of off-road circuits. Have fun with Moto X3M! The controls are simple ‚Äì use the keyboard arrow keys to control the acceleration and deceleration, and also your tilt. Ride through each course and try to land your jumps perfectly ‚Äì if you angle your bike incorrectly you risk tipping your bike over! 
Each level features different obstacles and objects for you to traverse ‚Äì you will find this game both fun and challenging! This is off-road biking to the max and for any motorbike fan, this game will provide a huge amount of enjoyment!
games.howToPlayText:
WASD or ARROWS 
Press the up arrow key to accelerate
Balance your bike with the left and right arrow keys
Break by pressing the down arrow key
Perform flips and other stunts to gain time
Don't crash

games.title: Car Smash Simulator: Crash & Tune
games.description:
Welcome to the ultimate car crash simulator!

Smash, crash, and customize your vehicles in a giant open-world sandbox. Experience realistic damage - watch doors fly off, hoods crumple, and wheels pop off in brutal crashes.

Drive through zones packed with destruction tools:
- Giant hammers
- Hydraulic crushers
- Mega ramps and more

Discover new cars roaming the world and make each one yours with tuning:
- Change full body color or individual parts
- Adjust wheel size, height, and camber
- Style your ride your way

Whether you're here to break stuff, perform insane stunts, or just roam free - it's your playground of metal and madness.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:
WASD - drive
Space - handbrake
Shift - nitro
Tab - pause
C - camera
R - flip car
K - repair
N - next car
B - slow motion

On mobile devices ‚Äî use on-screen buttons.

games.title: Police Chase Simulator
games.description:
Dive into the world of police chases, destruction, and crazy races!
Choose from over 15 vehicles, including sedans, SUVs, trucks, and special cars.

üó∫Ô∏è Maps:
‚Ä¢ üåÜ City with wide streets and green suburbs.
‚Ä¢ üåï Moon with low gravity and a cosmic backdrop.
‚Ä¢ üèûÔ∏è Countryside with hills, jumpable rocks, and a destruction zone.
‚Ä¢ üõ†Ô∏è Test area with ramps, presses, and numerous props for experimentation.

üé® Tuning:
‚Ä¢ Full control over your car's appearance ‚Äî paint every detail.
‚Ä¢ Adjust wheels: change camber, height, and size!

‚öôÔ∏è Destruction Physics:

‚è≥ Time Control:

üèÅ Game Modes:

games.title: Turbo Stunt Racing
games.description: Experience high-speed thrills in Turbo Stunt Racing! Perform epic stunts, race fierce rivals, and upgrade unique cars in this 3D arcade racer packed with action, traps, and ramps. Master precision driving and dominate every level!
games.howToPlayText:
Rev your engines and dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of Turbo Stunt Racing! This immersive 3D arcade racing game brings you stylized graphics and non-stop action. Face off against fierce opponents as you race through increasingly challenging levels.

In Turbo Stunt Racing, it‚Äôs not just about speed‚Äîit's about style! Complete daring stunts and master the art of precision driving to earn big rewards. Use your hard-earned cash to upgrade your vehicle or splurge on a brand-new ride, each with unique characteristics and performance boosts.

The levels are packed with dynamic obstacles, traps, and ramps that test your reflexes and racing skills. Navigate through perilous turns and soar over jaw-dropping jumps to stay ahead of the competition.

Whether you're a casual gamer or a racing enthusiast, Turbo Stunt Racing offers a thrilling experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Buckle up, hit the turbo, and prove you're the ultimate racing champion!

Controls:
‚Üë (Up Arrow / W): Accelerate
‚Üì (Down Arrow / S): Decelerate
‚Üê (Left Arrow / A): Steer left
‚Üí (Right Arrow / D): Steer right

games.title: Drifting Car Master
games.description:
Rush into the world of speed, adrenaline and dangerous turns! üî•

Welcome to Drifting Car Master ‚Äî an extreme racing game where every turn is a challenge and every meter is a fight for leadership!

üèéÔ∏è Compete with the best drifters around the world! Take part in exciting races on open tracks, where only skill, precise timing and a perfectly balanced skid will bring victory.

But be careful ‚Äî the police are always there! On the highway, it's not just speed that rules, but also risk. Patrols are hunting for those who are too fast cutting through the streets. Can you get away from the chase? Or will the cops catch you sooner?

, Game Features:

- Arcade physics and controls for perfect drift
- A variety of cars
- Dynamic chases with the police
- Car upgrade and customization to suit your style

Are you ready to win at any cost ‚Äî even if you have to evade the law?
games.howToPlayText:
W - Gas
A,D - Turn the car
S - Brake
To control the car on your mobile phone, use the buttons on the phone screen.

But be careful - your fuel is limited, and once you stop, you‚Äôll become easy prey. Time your nitro boosts wisely, as they might be the only thing that gets you over a hill or across a deadly gap.

games.title: Clash of Cars: Arena
games.description:
Welcome to the arena where the weak don‚Äôt survive!

Take the wheel of a legendary, heavily armed Hot Rod and challenge dozens of ruthless opponents.

Here, there are no rules ‚Äî only speed, firepower, and your reflexes decide who becomes the champion. Blast enemies with precise shots, collect stars, and unlock powerful upgrades for your battle beast.

Swap weapons, reinforce your armor, hit top speed, and leave nothing but smoke and wreckage behind!

Every arena is a new challenge, where only those willing to take risks can claim victory.

Ready to prove you‚Äôre the king of the road? Then hit the gas and race toward glory!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:

Desktop:
W, A, S, D ‚Äî move your car
Shift ‚Äî nitro boost
V ‚Äî jump
R ‚Äî use ability

Mobile:
Movement: Left stick (up, down, left, right)
Ability: Icon in the bottom center of the screen
Brake, Jump, Nitro Boost ‚Äî buttons on the bottom right

Goal:
Destroy your opponents to take the lead and become the king of the arena! Use your weapons wisely ‚Äî blow up enemies, trap them, and don‚Äôt give them a chance to fight back. One wrong move, and your car turns into a pile of scrap metal!

games.description:
Dive into a world where every crash is a masterpiece!  

- Realistic Destruction: Flying doors, hoods, wheels, and sparks under your feet.  
- Freedom of Action: Race, evade the police, or explore the open world at your own pace.  
- Unlimited Tuning: Customize paint jobs, wheel sizes, suspension height, and create your unique style.  
- Destruction Tools: Use presses, hammers, ramps to test vehicle durability.  

Key Features:  
- Dynamic police chases with realistic physics.  
- AI-driven bots that populate the game world.  
- Instant car repair for non-stop action.  

Each collision tells a new story. Every ride is your choice!

WASD - movement  
Space - handbrake

For mobile devices, use the game interface.

The goal of the game: just ride as you like ;)

games.description: Experience the thrill of Russian Drift: Overtaking in the City‚Äîan intense street racing game with realistic physics, stunning graphics, and adrenaline-fueled drifts. Overtake rivals, master your skills, and dominate the competition. Ready to become a legend?
games.howToPlayText:
W - Gas
A,D - Turn the car
S - Brake
To control the car on your mobile phone, use the buttons on the phone screen.

games.title: Obby Royal races in flight
games.description: Obby: Royal Races in Flight is an exciting online racing game where players can unlock fast cars and navigate challenging courses. Available on multiple platforms, it features stunning 3D graphics, opportunities for car upgrades, and fun for all ages, including exclusive options for premium members.

games.title: Dronner 3D
games.description: Dronner 3D - Immerse yourself in dynamic racing in a unique car that can turn into a quadcopter and overcome exciting tracks.
games.howToPlayText:
Dronner 3D - Immerse yourself in dynamic racing in a unique car that can turn into a quadcopter and overcome exciting tracks. 

Collect points and battery charges, avoid collisions that are especially dangerous in quadcopter mode, and monitor damage status and battery charge levels. 

As you progress through levels, upgrade your car by increasing battery capacity and repairing damage. At the end of each level you will find a table with statistics where you can evaluate your achievements.

Desktop Controls:

1. Movement on the ground:
‚Üë (Up Arrow) or W : Move forward.
‚Üì (Down Arrow) or W : Move back.
‚Üê (Left Arrow) or A : Move left.
‚Üí (Right Arrow) or D : Move right.

2. Switching modes:
Spacebar: Transform the machine into a quadcopter and back.

3. Air control:
‚Üë (Up Arrow) or W : Move forward.
‚Üì (Down Arrow) or W : Move back.
‚Üê (Left Arrow) or A : Move left.
‚Üí (Right Arrow) or D : Move right.
Q: Move upward.
E: Move downward.

games.title: Driverz Ed
games.description:
Welcome to Driverz Ed, with your instructor Ed! Explore Ed's beautiful island, completing challenges, or just drive around and try to find all the secrets the Island has to offer!

Find the hidden Puzzle Pieces and unlock every car.
games.howToPlayText:
Explore the world, find the hidden Puzzle Pieces, unlock every car.

Controls:
WASD to Move
Arrows to Move
Mouse to Control the Camera.

G - Fast Travel to Start of Races
M - Shows all available missions and current records
P - Pause and open settings

games.title: Tiny Delivery
games.description:
Tiny Delivery is an game, created by combining the ideas of food delivery and hill climbing.
Customize your car and wheels in the store, and complete each level with your favorite vehicle.
Before starting the game, you can activate the truck rack to keep the food from falling out, making it easier to finish the level.
games.howToPlayText: Use the left and right arrow keys on your keyboard (on PC) or the left and right touch buttons on your screen (on mobile) to move the vehicle forward and backward and deliver the food to the customer. Be careful not to drop the food! If the food falls on the ground, you will lose your level.

games.title: Turbo Racer Extreme
games.description: You race through traffic, dodging cars and trying to get the most amount of points. The closer you get to other cars - the more points you get. You can choose the difficulty and aesthetic of your race every time.
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to Turbo Racer Extreme In this racer you'll be able to drive in three modes, one way, two way and time attack. Every modes have three stages which are sunny, night and rainy. You need to drive and avoid getting hit or bumped by other cars. Speed your way on the highway and get your possible top speed. Unlock all the achievements and earn the highest points as possible, not just to get your name in the leaderboard but also you can purchase other cars using the points which was converted to coins. Play now and see how fast you can be!
Keyboard
Move - WASD or Left/Right/Up/Down Arrow Key
Brake - Space

games.description: Nubik Courier: An Open World is an exciting delivery game that turns you into a skilled pizza courier racing through lively city streets. Navigate obstacles and switch vehicles as you complete each delivery, all while enjoying free online play. Available on iOS, Android, and desktop, it's perfect for casual gamers seeking thrills.

games.title: Bouncy Motors
games.description:
Driving a car that bounces like jelly, you need to get to the finish line.
Beware of red zones - wheels fall off on impact! 
Also be careful when driving on ice!
games.howToPlayText:
Drive forward: W or ‚Üë or left stick (mobile)
Drive backward: S or ‚Üì or left stick (mobile)

Rotate counterclockwise: A or ‚Üê or right stick (on mobile)
Rotate clockwise: D or ‚Üí or right stick (mobile)

games.description: Crazy Descent is an exciting racing game where you can compete in high-speed aerial races instantly, no downloads needed. Experience captivating 3D visuals and fluid gameplay on any device, upgrade your vehicle, and take on various challenges, catering to both experienced racers and newcomers.
games.howToPlayText:
Mobile: touch the screen and swipe left/right
Desktop: W - go forward, A/D - turn, R - restart

Select your character, navigate through obstacles, and compete in various game modes, including dodging fruits and racing on water slides. Experience adrenaline-pumping action without downloads or registration across multiple platforms.

games.howToPlayText:
On desktop:
- Hold the right mouse button and swipe to move
On mobile:
- Hold your finger and swipe to move

games.title: Stunsteval Siderollers
games.description: STUNSTEVAL SIDEROLLERS is an arcade race with a side view. Try to outrun a helicopter, a biplane or a fighter jet. Drive in the rain or on a dark highway.
games.howToPlayText:
PC control:
D - forward
Double-tap D to lower the gear
A - back
W - gear up
S - gear low
The control on the phone is carried out using the arrows.

games.title: Hot Rods Arena Stars
games.description:
Welcome to the arena where the weak don‚Äôt survive!

Take the wheel of a legendary, heavily armed Hot Rod and challenge dozens of ruthless opponents.

Here, there are no rules ‚Äî only speed, firepower, and your reflexes decide who becomes the champion. Blast enemies with precise shots, collect stars, and unlock powerful upgrades for your battle beast.

Swap weapons, reinforce your armor, hit top speed, and leave nothing but smoke and wreckage behind!

Every arena is a new challenge, where only those willing to take risks can claim victory.

Ready to prove you‚Äôre the king of the road? Then hit the gas and race toward glory!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
W, A, S, D ‚Äî drive your car

Mobile:
Movement ‚Äî use the left stick (up, down, left, right)

Goal:
Collect stars to outscore your rivals. Use your weapons wisely ‚Äî blow up enemies, trap them, and don‚Äôt give them a chance to strike back. One mistake, and your car becomes scrap metal!

games.title: Mr. Drifter: Car Chase Simulator
games.description:
Run fast, crash hard, and cheat death ‚Äî in style.

Race through a chaotic low-poly city as you dodge police, traffic, and total destruction. Use game-changing power-ups like Slow-Mo, Freeze, and EMP Blasts to escape the impossible.

Unlock wild getaway cars
Grab power-ups mid-chase
Smash through obstacles & roadblocks
Stylized low-poly world with top-down tilt
Endless cops. Infinite chaos.

One rule: don‚Äôt stop. How long can you stay free?
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Move with WASD or Arrow Keys
Collect power-ups and dodge obstacles to stay alive

Touch Devices:
Use on-screen touch controls to steer

games.title: Fast and Wild in Sky
games.description: Prepare for an exciting adventure in the skies, where a single mistake sends you into the clouds. Race through unpredictable obstacles, testing your reflexes and abilities. Unlock and upgrade your vehicles as you take on high-stakes races that demand quick thinking and precision. Enjoy this thrilling experience online for free, on any device!
games.howToPlayText:
On PC:
WASD - vehicle control

On the phone:
Control the machine through the corresponding buttons on the screen

games.title: Moto X3M Spooky Land
games.description:
Moto X3M: Spooky Land is a spooky Halloween edition of the popular bike racing series. Put on your helmet, hop on your motorbike, and ride through haunted tracks filled with creepy traps, bone-made obstacles, and eerie surprises. Speed is key ‚Äì beat the clock while avoiding deadly hazards and pulling off flips to save precious time!

The controls are simple ‚Äì use the arrow keys to accelerate, brake, and tilt your bike for smooth landings. Each of the 32 levels introduces new spooky challenges, making the game both thrilling and tricky. For fans of off-road biking and Halloween fun, Moto X3M: Spooky Land is the perfect ride!
games.howToPlayText:
WASD or ARROWS 
Press the up arrow key to accelerate
Balance your bike with the left and right arrow keys
Break by pressing the down arrow key
Perform flips and other stunts to gain time
Don't crash
